meanings.definition: Praise or honor received for an achievement or accomplishment.
meanings.sent1: She received a kudo for her excellent presentation at work.
meanings.sent2: The team gave him a kudo for his hard work on the project.
meanings.sent3: The kudo she got for winning the race made her smile.
meanings.sent4: His kudo for being the top student shone like a bright star.
meanings.sent5: The kudo he received was like a pat on the back for a job well done.

meanings.definition: To give praise or honor for an achievement or accomplishment.
meanings.sent1: They kudoed her for completing the task ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent2: He always kudos his teammates after a successful game.
meanings.sent3: The teacher kudoed the students for their outstanding performance.
meanings.sent4: She kudos her friend's effort in organizing the event.
meanings.sent5: The manager kudoed the staff for their dedication to the project.
